str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
An exchange, purchasing price. From a compound of anti and allasso; an equivalent or ransom.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
